import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { DataContext } from '../Contexts/dataContext' import { DataProvider } from '../Contexts/dataContext' import '../component/history.css' export default function () { const [isWeightHeight, setWeightHeight] = useContext(DataContext) return ( <>
{isWeightHeight.map((value) => ( (value.height === null && value.weight === null) ?

No log found

:

{value.bmi}

Height: {value.height} (cm)

Weight: {value.weight} (kg)

Date: {value.date}

// console.log(value) )) }
); }
